body_html: @girving In case it's helpful, this is still an issue as of this week when using gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow:latest-gpu. As klopyrev mentioned, ln -s /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.4 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so , fixes the issue.
